member.name: T:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.AspNetCore.AspNetCoreDiagnostics
member.summary:
Instruments ASP.NET Core.
Unfortunately, ASP.NET Core only uses one instance for everything so we also only create one observer to ensure best performance.
Hosting events: https://github.com/aspnet/Hosting/blob/dev/src/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting/Internal/HostingApplicationDiagnostics.cs

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.AspNetCore.HostingOptions.ComponentName
member.summary: Allows changing the "component" tag of created spans.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.AspNetCore.HostingOptions.IgnorePatterns
member.summary:
A list of delegates that define whether or not a given request should be ignored.
If any delegate in the list returns true, the request will be ignored.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.AspNetCore.HostingOptions.ExtractEnabled
member.summary: A delegates that defines from which requests tracing headers are extracted.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.AspNetCore.HostingOptions.OperationNameResolver
member.summary: A delegate that returns the OpenTracing "operation name" for the given request.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.AspNetCore.HostingOptions.OnRequest
member.summary: Allows the modification of the created span to e.g. add further tags.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.AspNetCore.HostingOptions.OnError
member.summary: Allows the modification of the created span when error occured to e.g. add further tags.

member.name: T:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.CoreFx.GenericDiagnostics
member.summary: A subscriber that logs ALL events to .

A list of delegates that define whether or not a given request should be ignored.
If any delegate in the list returns true, the request will be ignored.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.CoreFx.HttpHandlerDiagnosticOptions.InjectEnabled
member.summary: A delegates that defines on what requests tracing headers are propagated.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.CoreFx.HttpHandlerDiagnosticOptions.OperationNameResolver
member.summary: A delegate that returns the OpenTracing "operation name" for the given request.

member.name: P:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.CoreFx.HttpHandlerDiagnosticOptions.OnRequest
member.summary: Allows the modification of the created span to e.g. add further tags.

member.summary: Allows the modification of the created span when error occured to e.g. add further tags.

member.name: T:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.CoreFx.HttpHandlerDiagnostics
member.summary:
Instruments outgoing HTTP calls that use .
See https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Net.Http/src/System/Net/Http/DiagnosticsHandler.cs
and https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Net.Http/src/System/Net/Http/DiagnosticsHandlerLoggingStrings.cs

member.name: T:OpenTracing.Contrib.NetCore.Internal.PropertyFetcher.PropertyFetch
member.summary: PropertyFetch is a helper class. It takes a PropertyInfo and then knows how to efficiently fetch that property from a .NET object (See Fetch method). It hides some slightly complex generic code.
